posts.post_content:
If you have either of these cards (or both) available, I would surely like to know.  Yes, I know a Dobbs sold recently.

I am able to purchase them outright or I can trade T210s should you prefer that instead. 

Please email me at [url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url] to discuss further.  

Remember, this holiday season, it is better to give than to receive.  :)
